output.sentences: At carnivals, jubilee is a game you can play by tossing a ring on a stick.
I loved riding in the car carousel at my community carnival.
The other thing I loved was the germ infested ball pit.
The variety of colorful balls left me mesmerized and looked like a giant gumball machine.
When I rode the ferris wheel I felt absolutely terrified, but once I pctured myself as one gumball amongst a sea of others, I felt a calm within me.
